sigmod.title: SigMod Client
sigmod.desc: Custom mod menu, automation, UI tweaks

Footer.text: ¬© 2025 Sigmally Modz. Not affiliated with Sigmally.

hero.title: Sigmally Modz
hero.sub: Take Sigmally to the next level ‚Äî faster gameplay, smarter tools, and full control at your fingertips.

what.title: What‚Äôs Sigmally?
what.desc: Sigmally is a private server-based agar.io-style game. Fast-paced, competitive, and accessible in-browser, it‚Äôs built for players who want simplicity and enjoyable physics. Eat pellets, grow by consuming other players and dominate the leaderboard.

why.title: Why
why.desc: Sigmally Modz gives you deeper control over the game. Whether you‚Äôre a casual or competitive player, the mods help with macros, multibox tools, smoother visuals and customization. Everything is designed to boost performance and gameplay comfort.

sigmod.title: SigMod
sigmod.desc: SigMod enhances your overall Sigmally experience with powerful features like macros, custom themes, advanced settings and more. Designed for smoother gameplay and smarter control, it gives you the tools to play your best.

sigfixes.title: SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: SigFixes rewrites major parts of the Sigmally client, improving performance, stability and precision. It eliminates lag spikes, allows multiboxing and adds options like draw delay, custom opacity, name scaling and much more.

questions.question: Are tampermonkey and the userscripts safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely, because who wouldn‚Äôt trust installing random scripts from the internet to improve their game, right? But seriously ‚Äî Tampermonkey is a well-established tool used by millions, and our userscripts only tweak your game experience without any funny business. There are also reviews on the script pages. So yeah, it‚Äôs safe. Use with confidence.

questions.question: Do I need both SigMod and SigFixes?
questions.answer: No, but using both gives the best performance and customization. They're designed to work together.

questions.question: Is SigMod and SigFixes allowed in Sigmally?
questions.answer: Yes. SigMod is approved by the owner of Sigmally and widely embraced by the community. Both mods are fully accepted.

questions.question: Can I uninstall the mods anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, just disable or remove them from your userscript manager.

questions.question: Will SigMod make me a pro gamer overnight?
questions.answer: If only! SigMod can make gameplay smoother and easier, but it won't do your skills or reflexes for you. Practice still required.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Sigmally Modz has a Discord server ‚Äî not the most lively place, but perfect if you‚Äôve found a bug, need help, or just want to ask ‚Äúwhy is this broken?‚Äù at 3AM. Support lives there (sometimes).

Hero.title: SigMod Client
Hero.sub: Upgrade your Sigmally experience with advanced macros, tag-based teams, UI control, and full in-game customization.

macros.title: Macros & Automation
macros.desc: Streamline gameplay with programmable hotkeys, customizable mouse macros, auto‚Äërespawn, and automated daily‚Äëcoin collection.

party.title: Party & Tag System
party.desc: Assign 3‚Äëletter tags to teammates with real‚Äëtime minimap tracking, private chat channels, and precision pings.

customization.title: Full Customization
customization.desc: Personalize every aspect‚Äîmodify UI themes, fonts, layouts, and keybindings in a unified in‚Äëgame mod menu.

WhySigMod.title: Why Choose SigMod?
WhySigMod.desc1: SigMod upgrades the Sigmally client with smart automation, visual customization, and full UI control. Set macros, adjust layouts, manage hotkeys, and tweak visuals‚Äîall inside a clean mod menu. Switch themes, save names, and take screenshots with ease.
WhySigMod.desc2: Stay in sync with teammates using a live tag system: chat privately, send pings, and track friends on the minimap. View real-time stats, manage your friend list, and fine-tune chat visibility, colors, and keybinds.
WhySigMod.performance: Want even better performance? Combine SigMod with

list.title: Macros & Automation
list.summary: Automate every move ‚Äî keybinds, tricksplits & mouse macros
list.details: Bind keys for advanced actions like rapid feed, double/triple/quad splits, and tricksplits. Create mouse macros for left/right click behaviors. Configure split sequences with precise delay settings and feed speeds. Toggle settings like names, skins, or respawn with a key ‚Äî all fully customizable.

list.title: Party & Tag System
list.summary: 3-letter tags, minimap tracking, pings & private party chat
list.details: Assign yourself a tag (up to 3 characters) to form private teams. Members are tracked on the minimap, listed in a party panel with name and score, and can send precise pings. The party chat allows for secure communication, isolated from public chat. You‚Äôll also see who sent which ping by tag index.

list.title: Menu Customization
list.summary: Themes, fonts, layout, tabs, borders, and input styling
list.details: Personalize your UI with themes, rounded corners, background images, and custom input borders. Hide unwanted elements like Discord or language buttons. Customize tab order, spacing, shadows, and switch between preset layouts for a fully personalized experience.

list.title: Visual Game Settings
list.summary: Tweak map colors, opacity, cell styling and fonts
list.details: Adjust color and transparency of key game elements like the map, border, food, and cells. Replace in-game images such as viruses or map backgrounds. Choose different fonts, show/hide player names and skins, apply text outlines, and toggle visual overlays like grid and border.

list.title: Gallery & Screenshots
list.summary: Capture moments & manage your game gallery
list.details: Assign a keybind to instantly take a screenshot in-game. Browse your image collection in the Gallery tab. Each image includes timestamp, delete, and download options. Easily manage or clean your gallery in one place.

list.title: Name Tools & Color Effects
list.summary: Save names, use generators, gradients & symbols
list.details: Access nickname generators from popular sites (NickFinder, Tell.wtf). Save your favorite names for one-click copying. Create stylish names with special characters and design vibrant name colors using gradients and two-tone effects. Quick delete or reuse features built in.

list.title: Friends & Mod Profile
list.summary: Add users, chat privately & manage your mod identity
list.details: Add and chat with friends using username or Discord login. See online status, tag, server, and more. Use filters and search to find users. Customize your mod profile with avatar, bio, status, and color highlights. Accept/decline requests and toggle public visibility options.

list.title: Stats & Quick Access Panel
list.summary: Track gameplay and toggle key settings instantly
list.details: The Home tab shows stats like time played, top mass, and total deaths. The quick access panel lets you toggle Mass, Grid, Border, Jelly Physics, Auto-Respawn, Coin Claim and more ‚Äî right from the menu without digging through settings.

list.title: Chat System Overhaul
list.summary: Custom mod chat with tabs, keybinds & full control
list.details: Switch between Party and Main chat via tabs. Messages update live using websocket interception. Use keybinds to send your location, toggle blur, enable time tags, or enable compact mode. Customize text, background, and full theme color including transparency.

list.question: What are the core features of SigMod?
list.answer: SigMod includes a fully customizable mod menu, powerful macros and automation tools, a party & tag system, live in-game stats, and a modern chat, name, and friend system ‚Äî all integrated to enhance your Sigmally gameplay.

list.question: What customization options does SigMod offer?
list.answer: You can change themes, fonts, layout spacing, border radius, name colors (including gradients), UI opacity, menu visuals, game colors, and toggle dozens of visual settings. It also supports deathscreen tweaks, skin overrides, and background presets.

list.question: What is the tag system?
list.answer: The tag system lets you assign a 3-letter code to create a party with teammates. You can track each other on the minimap, chat in a private party channel, send pings, and view scores in a shared party panel with member names and tag indexes.

list.question: How does the friend system work?
list.answer: You can log in to create a mod profile and add other players as friends. View profiles, roles, online status, server info, and chat with them directly. Friend requests, search, settings, and profile customization (avatar, bio, status) are all included.

list.question: How do I open the SigMod menu?
list.answer: Press the V key or click the gear icon in the top-right corner of the game to open the mod menu. It includes tabs for Macros, Themes, Gallery, Friends, and more.

list.question: Can I customize hotkeys and macros?
list.answer: Yes. SigMod includes advanced keybinding tools for feeding, splitting, tricksplits, and more. You can also assign mouse macros, configure linesplit behavior, set rapid feed speed, and bind UI toggles like menu, names, or autorespawn.

list.question: Does SigMod affect game performance?
list.answer: SigMod adds many features but is optimized to stay lightweight. For better framerate or reduced lag, install SigFixes ‚Äî which patches performance bottlenecks in the base Sigmally client.

list.question: Can I take and manage screenshots?
list.answer: Yes. Use a custom keybind to capture in-game screenshots instantly. View them by date in the Gallery tab, and download or delete them with one click.

Community.title: Join the Community
Community.text: Need help, found a bug, or want to share your custom macros? Join the Discord and connect with other SigMod users.

QuickGuide.title: Quick Guide
QuickGuide.note: Note that this page isn't as detailed as the full guide.

tampermonkey.title: Install Tampermonkey
tampermonkey.desc: Install the userscript manager required to run SigMod and SigFixes.

developermode.title: Enable Developer Mode
developermode.desc: Follow the steps in the pictures below. Restart your browser enabling the developer mode.

sigmod.title: Install SigMod
sigmod.desc: Adds macros, customization, party tags, and more.

sigfixes.title: Install SigFixes
sigfixes.desc: Boost FPS, reduce lag, enable multiboxing.

play.title: Play Sigmally
play.desc: Everything is ready now. Time to play.

Overview.title: Getting Started
Overview.desc: Welcome to SigMod. This guide will help you install everything needed for the best Sigmally experience ‚Äî fast, smooth, and fully customized.
Overview.access: You'll get access to features like macros, themes, FPS boosts, and more. All in just a few simple steps.

UserscriptManager.title: Install a userscript manager
UserscriptManager.desc: To install and use scripts on websites, you need a userscript manager.
UserscriptManager.instruction: In this guide, we'll use Tampermonkey. Click below to go to the download page for your browser.
UserscriptManager.installed: Once installed, you‚Äôll be ready to add userscripts like <SigMod>SigMod</SigMod> and <SigFixes>SigFixes</SigFixes> in the next step.

DevMode.title: Enable Developer Mode
DevMode.desc: Tampermonkey requires Developer Mode enabled to function properly and allow installation of userscripts like SigMod and SigFixes.

chrome.title: For Chrome, Edge & Opera
steps: Click the puzzle icon in your browser‚Äôs toolbar.
Or open directly: chrome://extensions / edge://extensions / opera://extensions

firefox.title: For Firefox
steps: Enable Developer Mode in the settings or options menu.

safari.title: For Safari
steps: Please refer to your browser‚Äôs documentation to enable Developer Mode for extensions.

default.title: Browser Instructions
steps: Please refer to your browser‚Äôs documentation to enable Developer Mode for extensions.

note.label: Note:
note.text: After enabling Developer Mode, restart your browser to ensure Tampermonkey works correctly.

SigMod.title: Install SigMod
SigMod.desc: Now that you have installed a userscript manager, it's time to install SigMod. SigMod adds core features to your game: macros, custom themes, advanced settings and more.
SigMod.popup: Click below to install SigMod. In the popup you have to click the Install button.
SigMod.after: After installing, SigMod will automatically run on Sigmally. You can customize it anytime in the in-game settings. If you want to find out more about SigMod, you can check it out <link>here</link>.

SigFixes.title: Install SigFixes
SigFixes.desc: Sigmally Fixes rewrites a large portion of Sigmally's client, making it much faster and smoother. Made by yx.
SigFixes.features: SigFixes includes plenty of settings for advanced players like one-tab multiboxing, outlining unsplittable cells, custom draw delay, text size, skins, and opacity.

End.title: Congrats! üéâ
End.desc: You now have SigMod and SigFixes installed and are ready to play Sigmally. Feel free to explore all features of each mod to get the most out of your experience.
